Merton Daniel Simpson (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 1928 , rụo ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Machị, 2013) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-adịghị ahụkebe na onye na-anakọta ihe osise na ónyé na'ere ahịa.
A mụrụ Merton Simpson na Charleston, South Carolina
N'agbata afọ isii na afọ iri na otu, ọ na-etinye oge ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na-anata ọgwụgwọ màkà diphtheria na rheumatic fever
N'oge a, ọ malitere ịde ihe na eserese iji gafee oge
Mmasị ya na nka toro ma ọ malitere ise ihe na eserese n'ụzọ siri ike
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, onye na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ bụ William Halsey chọpụtara Simpson nke kpọọrọ Simpson n'okpuru nku ya
N'ime afọ anọ sochirinụ, Halsey kụziiri Simpson ihe ndị bụ isi nke eserese ma mee ka ọ mata echiche nke nka na-enweghị atụ
Jean Robertson Fleming, onye ọzọ na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ, nyekwara aka n'ịchọpụta nkà Simpson ma nyèrè ya aka ịzụlite nkà ya.
N'etiti South nke ka kewara ekewa, ekweghị ka Simpson gaa nkụzi nka na ọbọdọ Gibbes Gallery ebe ónyé na-ese ihe William Melton Halsey na-arụ ọrụ
Simpson na ónyé nkuzi ya Halsey na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya ugboro ugboro
Simpson gàrà Burke High School na Charleston
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1949 Halsey, nwunye ya Corrie McCallum na onye bụbu ónyé nduzi nke Charleston Museum Laura Bragg kwadoro Merton Simpsonia nke mbụ solo art show
E mèrè oriri abụọ màkà ihe ngosi nka ahụ; "otu maka ndị ọcha na otu màkà ndị ọcha ndị na-enweghị mmasị ịbịa oriri na ndị isi ojii".

Simpson ghọrọ ónyé Africa America mbụ natara prestigious afọ ise fellowship site na Charleston Scientific and Cultural Education fund wee hapụ South Carolina na 1949 gaa New York City mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gàrà Mahadum New York (NYU) màkà afọ mbụ ma bụrụ onye Cooper Union nabatara
Ọ gàrà nkụzi na NYU n'ehihie na Cooper Union n'abalị
Simpson nwetakwara ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa nke Herbert Benevy
Ọtụtụ ndị omenkà a ma ama bịara n'ụlọ ahịa etiti ma ka oge na-aga katọọ ọrụ Simpson ma soro ya nwee mmekọrịta
Na NYU, Simpson matara Hale Woodruff, William Baziotes na Robert Motherwell
Ụlọ akwụkwọ New York na-enwekwa mmetụta ya n'oge ahụ na Merton Simpson na Franz Kline, Max Weber na Willem de Kooning na ụlọ ahịa etiti
N'ime kọleji niile Simpson gara na New York, o nyèrè ụlọ ahịa etiti otuto màkà inye ya ezigbo agụmakwụkwọ ya.
Mgbè afọ anọ gachara, Simpson laghachiri NYU iji maliteghachi ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1951, ọrụ ya pụtara n'ihe ngosi na Museum of Modern Art na n'afọ 1954 e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Younger American Painters na Guggenheim Museum
Ka aha ya na-etolite, ọrụ nka ya mèrè ihe ngosi n'ọtụtụ gallery na New York City na ọbụna Washington, DC
Ka ọ na-erule 1955, Simpson nwèrè ihe ngosi otu ónyé na Bertha Schaeffer Gallery
Ka Simpson na-etolite na New York, ọ malitekwara inwe mmasị na School of Paris ma guzobe ebe obibi na capitol
Mpaghara ọhụrụ ahụ nwere mmetụta doro anya na nke doro anya na ụdị eserese ya nke ndị na-ese brush nke ụlọ akwụkwọ New York mepụtara nke ukwuu
Simpson kewara oge ya n'etiti Paris na New York ebe o guzobere gallery nke ya na 1950s
The Merton D

Simpson Gallery of Modern and Tribal Arts bụ nke a ma ama maka nchịkọta pụrụ iche nke Tribal arts, na maka ihe osise nke ndị ọgbọ ya Romare Bearden, Beauford Delaney, Norman Lewis, Charles Alston, Hale Woodruff na John Biggers, n'etiti ndị ọzọ.
Merton Simpson lụrụ Beatrice Houston, ónyé ọ hụrụ n'anya n'oge ọ bụ nwata si South Carolina na 1954
Ọ meghere ụlọ ngosi nka ya na Madison Avenue iji kwado ezinụlọ ya na-eto eto nke na-echeta ọmụmụ nwa mbụ ya, Merton Simpson Jr
Di na nwunye ahụ nwèrè nwá nwoke ọzọ aha ya bụ, Kenneth Simpson na 1959
Merton na Beatrice Simpson gbara alụkwaghịm na 2008
Ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ, Merton Jr
na Kenneth Simpson hapụrụ ya.
N'afọ 2000, ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri Merton Simpson kwagara na nọmba irí atọ na asatọ nà West 28th Street na mpaghara Chelsea nke Manhattan
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ nwere nnukwu nchịkọta nke nka Africa na nke agbụrụ, nka nke ógè a na ọrụ Merton Simpson na akwụkwọ na ihe osise.
Ihe ngosi gosipụtara na ọrụ Merton D
Simpson:
